**Implementation**

```{r, echo=T}

FizzBuzz<- function(n){
           out<-seq(n)
           out[(seq(n) %%3)==0]= 'Fizz'
           out[(seq(n) %%5)==0]= 'Buzz'
           out[(seq(n) %%15==0)]= 'FizzBuzz'
           return (out)
           }

#Inside the FizzBuzz function first define the imput as a sequence using seq() command and store the sequence as "out". To print out each element inside the sequence "out" according to different conditions using subset([ ]). 

###


```

**Output**
```{r, echo=TRUE}
FizzBuzz(100)
```
